title: String sounds
creator_credit: Churchill Films and Pieter Van Deusen
brief_description: This film illustrates the range of string sounds available, using different kinds of instruments, strings and ways of making strings vibrate. Demonstrates basic principles of string instruments and presents various performances. Suitable for upper primary level.
description: This film illustrates the range of string sounds available, using different kinds of instruments, strings and ways of making strings vibrate. Demonstrates basic principles of string instruments and presents various performances. Suitable for upper primary level.
